stimulusHtml: (a) Evaluate the improper integral ∫ 3 ∞ f ( x )   d x MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaWaa8qmaeaaca WGMbGaaiikaiaadIhacaGGPaGaaeiiaiaadsgacaWG4baaleaacaaI ZaaabaGaeyOhIukaniabgUIiYdaaaa@4017@ , or show that the integral diverges.

stimulusHtml: (c) Determine whether the series  ∑ n = 1 ∞ ( − 1 ) n ( e n ⋅ f ( n ) ) = ∑ n = 1 ∞ ( − 1 ) n ( n 2 + 9 ) e n MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaWaaabCaeaada WcaaqaamaabmaabaGaeyOeI0IaaGymaaGaayjkaiaawMcaamaaCaaa leqabaGaamOBaaaaaOqaamaabmaabaGaamyzamaaCaaaleqabaGaam OBaaaakiabgwSixlaadAgacaGGOaGaamOBaiaacMcaaiaawIcacaGL PaaaaaaaleaacaWGUbGaeyypa0JaaGymaaqaaiabg6HiLcqdcqGHri s5aOGaeyypa0ZaaabCaeaadaWcaaqaamaabmaabaGaeyOeI0IaaGym aaGaayjkaiaawMcaamaaCaaaleqabaGaamOBaaaakmaabmaabaGaam OBamaaCaaaleqabaGaaGOmaaaakiabgUcaRiaaiMdaaiaawIcacaGL PaaaaeaacaWGLbWaaWbaaSqabeaacaWGUbaaaaaaaeaacaWGUbGaey ypa0JaaGymaaqaaiabg6HiLcqdcqGHris5aaaa@5CDB@  converges absolutely, converges conditionally, or diverges.
